argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mgm2nsgrp.s | |- S = { A , B } |
| 2 |  | mgm2nsgrp.b | |- ( Base ` M ) = S |
| 3 |  | sgrp2nmnd.o | |- ( +g ` M ) = ( x e. S , y e. S |-> if ( x = A , A , B ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_sgrp2nmndlem4 | |- ( ( # ` S ) = 2 -> M e. SGrp ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_sgrp2nmndlem5 | |- ( ( # ` S ) = 2 -> M e/ Mnd ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_jca | |- ( ( # ` S ) = 2 -> ( M e. SGrp /\ M e/ Mnd ) ) |
